  • Method Details

    • createFrame

      private void createFrame()
      createFrame() creates show the first frame with logo-image in background and a progress bar. During the load, this method prepares a new frame used by the loginPanel and try to establish a connection calling the ConnectionPanel

    • updateLoginScreen

      public void updateLoginScreen​(InvalidNameMessage invalidNameMessage)
      Update the mainFrame with the LoginPanel. If invalidNameMessage is equals 'NULL' then the user have to insert the nickname for the first time; else the nickname sent to the server is not valid, so a JOptionPane is showed to the user to notify him, then he can reinsert a new nickname.
      Specified by:
      updateLoginScreen in interface View

    • updateLobby

      public void updateLobby​(LobbyMessage lobbyMessage)
      Update the mainFrame with the LobbyMessagePanel. Add information to the 'playersInfo' structure.
      Specified by:
      updateLobby in interface View
      Parameters:
      lobbyMessage -

    • updateBoard

      public void updateBoard​(BoardMessage boardMessage)
      Set not visible the mainFrame And create a new Frame BoardGui assigning it to the variable 'board' only if this variable is null. When the board is create, this method update the the frame passing the boardmessage to BoardGui.
      Specified by:
      updateBoard in interface View
      Parameters:
      boardMessage -

    • updateDefeat
